name: Atramentum VR
description:
Story

You steal a game in a Voodoo shop... ATRAMENTUM
The rules warn you not to play it after midnight... If you do, a gateway to darkness will open.....
you will find yourself in different places where you will have to pass various tests in order to get back again.

Gameplay

Atramentum is a horror puzzle game with different locations where you have to solve tasks. In a creepy atmosphere some tricky mysteries are waiting for you....
